data.title: Wall + Orb for Rafters B Site Execute
data.description: Enable your team with this combination of Viper utility, as it blocks off any B Heaven player's field of vision.

data.title: Market Snakebite to B Site Pillar
data.description: Use this molly lineup to flush out any Defenders playing that powerful pillar position.

data.title: Standard B Site Default Orb From Market
data.description: Here's a strong default orb you can throw at the start of the round to pressure any B Site Defender, as you threaten a lurk or shooting B Heaven players from the side.

data.title: Market to B Default Post Plant Snakebite
data.description: Here's a simple post plant molly lineup you can throw to prevent Defenders from defusing at B Default.

data.title: Post Plant A Site Snake Bite Lineup from A Lobby
data.description: Here's a post plant Snake Bite lineup for A Site from A Lobby, that can be used for two different common spike plant spots on Site.
